title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: Lowes and Leehall, it seems, had metby chance near Sewing Shields, with the usual result.

title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: Not distant would they be, too, from good company, for away tothe north across the Tyne, in a mighty cavern in the rock--below whatonce was the castle of Sewing Shields--does not local tradition tellthat Arthur and his knights lie asleep, waiting the inevitable day whenEngland's dire need shall bring them again to life, to strike a blow forthe land they loved.
